title: Bug 7330: Add Javadoc Comment action not available on text selection
description:
Bug 7330: Make more actions available on text selection.
I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, the actions are distributed on a personal taste basis, which is not clear to users. It is not acceptable to force users to switch the view to access certain actions.
OB: When I select some text in the editor, the option 'Add Javadoc Comment' is missing from either the context menu or global menu.
EB: I expected the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action to be available when I select text in the editor.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the editor.
2. Select some text.
3. Observe the available options in the context menu or global menu.
